definition: to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture

sentences.english: The first part narrates Shang and Zhou period personalities do not stand independently.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分讲述商周时期人格的不独立。

sentences.english: The story speaks of more than thankfulness.
sentences.chinese: 这故事讲述的不仅仅是感激之情。

sentences.english: To narrate is to give an account of what happened or is happening.
sentences.chinese: 记叙文讲述的是发生在当前或过去事情的经过。

sentences.english: Last week, we talked about the growth of the cattle industry.
sentences.chinese: 上周，我们向你讲述了美国养牛业迅速发展的情况。

sentences.english: He told a heart-wrenching story of his childhood in the impoverished countryside.
sentences.chinese: 他讲述了在贫困农村度过的悲惨童年的经历。

sentences.english: Bending the ear of the hedgerow with stories of fire and sword.
sentences.chinese: 吹压着篱木的耳朵，讲述剑与火的故事。

sentences.english: And BedelL listened as she told him about her brothers and about James.
sentences.chinese: 比德尔也倾听她讲述他的兄弟和丈夫詹姆斯的事。

sentences.english: Chapter II is mainly about the role of the local history in high school history teaching.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，主要讲述乡土史在高中历史教学中的作用。

sentences.english: Snider shares her personal story in the introduction.
sentences.chinese: 斯奈德在介绍中给我们讲述了她自己的故事。

sentences.english: The main option I focus on in this article is the inline editor switch.
sentences.chinese: 本文将重点讲述的主要选项是行内编辑器开关。

sentences.english: It takes work to tell a story succinctly.
sentences.chinese: 简洁地讲述一个故事是需要花功夫的。

sentences.english: The second chapter narrated the comprehensive budget management elementary theory.
sentences.chinese: 第二章讲述了全面预算管理的基本理论。

sentences.english: Last month I talked about how to write a device driver for radio-tuner cards.
sentences.chinese: 上个月我讲述了怎样为音频接收卡编写设备驱动。

sentences.english: Our course deals with the essentials of management.
sentences.chinese: 我们的课程讲述管理的基本要点。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 treats the design of the timing synchronization loop.
sentences.chinese: 第三章讲述了基于内插思想的同步环路设计。

sentences.english: Hostesses are also writing best-selling books, be they on money management or the art of conversation.
sentences.chinese: 陪酒女们也写出了畅销书，讲述如何理财和谈话艺术。

definition: to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
hero (of a novel or film)/main protagonist
to recount/to narrate/to give an account of
heroine (of a novel or film)/main female protagonist
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
to recount/to tell of/to relate/(fig.) (of a thing) to stand as testament to (some past history)
(of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
